fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli

Class Viewport

  • Object
    • Viewport

  • public class Viewport
extends Object
    Viewport associated with a LayerViewPanel. This class is responsible for the transformation between view coordinates and model coordinates.
    Author:
    Julien Perret

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getSpacingInPixels

        public double getSpacingInPixels()
        Returns:
        The number of pixels used to approximate a curve. It is used both when transforming a curve to a linestring (especially for rendering).

      • setSpacingInixels

        public void setSpacingInixels(double spacingInPixels)
        Set the number of pixels used to approximate a curve. It is used both when transforming a curve to a linestring (especially for rendering).
        Parameters:
        spacingInPixels - The number of pixels used to approximate a curve.

      • getLayerViewPanels

        public final Collection<LayerViewPanel> getLayerViewPanels()
        Returns:
        The LayerViewPanel associated with the viewport

      • getMETERS_PER_PIXEL

        public static double getMETERS_PER_PIXEL()
        Returns:
        Taille d'un pixel en m (la longueur d'un cote de pixel de l'ecran) utilise pour le calcul de l'echelle courante de la vue.

      • getScale

        public final double getScale()
        Returns:
        The scale of the viewport

      • getModelToViewTransform

        public final AffineTransform getModelToViewTransform()
                                              throws NoninvertibleTransformException
        Returns:
        The AffineTransform corresponding to the transformation from model to view coordinates.
        Throws:
        NoninvertibleTransformException - throws an exception when the transformation fails
        See Also:
        update()

      • update

        public final void update()
                  throws NoninvertibleTransformException

        See Also:

      • modelToViewTransform

        public static AffineTransform modelToViewTransform(double xScale,
                                                   double yScale,
                                                   Point2D viewOrigin,
                                                   double height)
        Compute the AffineTransform corresponding to the transformation from model to view coordinates.
        Parameters:
        xScale - the X scale of the view
        yScale - the Y scale of the view
        viewOrigin - the origin of the view
        height - the height of the view
        Returns:
        The AffineTransform corresponding to the transformation from model to view coordinates.
        See Also:
        getEnvelopeInModelCoordinates(), update()

      • modelToViewTransform

        public static AffineTransform modelToViewTransform(double scale,
                                                   Point2D viewOrigin,
                                                   double height)
        Compute the AffineTransform corresponding to the transformation from model to view coordinates.
        Parameters:
        scale - the scale of the view
        viewOrigin - the origin of the view
        height - the height of the view
        Returns:
        The AffineTransform corresponding to the transformation from model to view coordinates.
        See Also:

      • toViewDirectPositionList

        public final IDirectPositionList toViewDirectPositionList(IDirectPositionList modelDirectPositionList)
                                                   throws NoninvertibleTransformException
        Transform a direct position list in model coordinates to view coordinates.
        Parameters:
        modelDirectPositionList - a direct position list in model coordinates
        Returns:
        a DirectPositionList of DirectPosition in the screen coordinate system corresponding to the given DirectPositionList in model coordinate system
        Throws:
        NoninvertibleTransformException - throws an exception when the transformation fails

      • toViewPoint

        public final Point2D toViewPoint(IDirectPosition modelDirectPosition)
                          throws NoninvertibleTransformException
        Transform a direct position in model coordinates to view coordinates.
        Parameters:
        modelDirectPosition - a direct position list in model coordinates
        Returns:
        a Point2D (on the screen) corresponding to the given DirectPosition in model coordinate system
        Throws:
        NoninvertibleTransformException - throws an exception when the transformation fails

        Returns:

      • zoom

                       int y,
                       double widthOfNewView,
                       double heightOfNewView)
                throws NoninvertibleTransformException
        Zoom to the given coordinates with the given width and height.
        Parameters:
        x - upper left corner X coordinate
        y - upper left corner Y coordinate
        widthOfNewView - widht of the new view
        heightOfNewView - height of the new view
        Throws:
        NoninvertibleTransformException - throws an exception when the transformation fails

                                           throws NoninvertibleTransformException
        Transform a point in view coordinates to a direct position in model coordinates.
        Parameters:
        viewPoint - a 2D point
        Returns:
        a DirectPosition in the model coordinate system corresponding to the viewPoint (on the screen)

      • toPoint2D

        public static Point2D toPoint2D(IDirectPosition p)

        Parameters:
        p - an IDirectPosition
        Returns:
        a corresponding Point2D.Double
